description.zh: 在线路径规划工具，支持多种路径规划算法，包含全覆盖路径算法和最短路径规划算法，上传地图，找到最优路径，支持多种格式地图上传。
description.en: Supports multiple path planning algorithms, including full coverage path algorithms and shortest path planning algorithms. Upload a map and find the optimal path. Multiple map formats are supported for upload.

description.zh: 快速生成各种类型的二维码，支持文本、链接、WiFi等多种内容格式。
description.en: Quickly generate various types of QR codes with support for text, links, WiFi and other content formats.
